item.title: Rubbish dumped on floor, large wooden storage tied to railings near fire escape of John Ratcliffe House. Human excrement on street at opening of carpark which is on w9 postcode. Please send an official to check the bin situation as the block 197-205 is infested with rodents., 5th August

item.title: Two horrific potholes in the bus lane, 5th August
item.description:
Around 5 meters before the traffic lights in front of Bill's there are massive potholes from buses or HGV, not cracks just worn out little sinkholes, right where the wheels of your cars are, It got so deep the last month and it's not always possible to drive around it as they are cars waiting on red towards deptford, please fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Nelson Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead baby fox, 5th August

item.title: The same white van, with a tipped back- and the same men fly tipped on the pile there already, 5th August
item.description:
I saw 2 men dumping more industrial waste on top of a pile already reported- now there is at least 70 black bags fly tipped. I didn't see the number plate, but I saw the 2 men. They have dumped waste I thus location 3 times in 3 days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Corinthian Manorway, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
